scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.build:js: browserify src/resource/js/main.js > src/resource/js/bundle.js | browserify src/resource/js/bundle.js | uglifyjs --compress > resource/js/bundle.min.js
scripts.build:css: mkdir src/resource/css && lessc src/resource/less/main.less | postcss -u autoprefixer -u pixrem -c postcss.json | cleancss > src/resource/css/bundle.min.css
